entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
